statements: UPDATE suspicious_transactions SET flag_reason = 'Fraudulent activity' WHERE transaction_id = 12345;

UPDATE suspicious_transactions SET flag_reason = 'Unauthorized payment', amount = 2000 WHERE account_id = 54321;
UPDATE suspicious_transactions SET flagged = true WHERE transaction_id = 'e56e1a19-3c67-4e97-86bd-f1de2728412b';

UPDATE transaction_history SET user_id = 'aaddccec-3397-41c1-a92f-af5b097df0b4', transaction_time = '2022-06-15 10:30:00', amount = 500.75 WHERE transaction_id = '77b5cd09-6b7d-4cbb-97f8-b0b46802e5fc';
UPDATE suspicious_transactions SET amount = 500.00, flagged = TRUE WHERE transaction_id = '11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111';
UPDATE transaction_history SET amount = 1000.00, transaction_time = '2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE user_id = '22222222-2222-2222-2222-222222222222';
UPDATE flagging_transactions SET suspicious_flag = false WHERE transaction_amount > 1000
UPDATE flagged_users SET flag_reason = 'Fraudulent Activity Detected' WHERE user_name = 'John Doe'
UPDATE flagging_transactions SET suspicious_flag = true WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
UPDATE flagged_users SET user_email = 'john.doe@example.com', flag_reason = 'High risk user' WHERE user_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE suspicious_transactions SET amount = 2000.50, flag_reason = 'Suspicious activity detected' WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE transactions_tracking SET tracking_status = 'Delivered', updated_at = NOW() WHERE tracking_id = 101;
UPDATE suspicious_transactions SET amount = amount + 500 WHERE transaction_type = 'Transfer';
UPDATE transactions_tracking SET updated_at = current_timestamp WHERE tracking_status = 'Pending';
UPDATE customers SET name = 'John Doe', phone_number = '+123456789' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 100.50, is_flagged = TRUE WHERE transaction_id = 5;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 500.55, is_flagged = TRUE WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
